SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface AssaultPartyInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssaultParty
public interface AssaultPartyInterface extends Remote
Operational interface of a remote object of type AssaultParty. It provides the functionality to access the AssaultParty.
